description: Validator for the customer_defined_notification callflow's data object

recipients.description: One or more specific email addresses, Kazoo user ids or a combination of both

id.description: The email address/user ID or the list of email addresses/user IDs based on sepecified type

type.description: Controls if the ID of this object is a Kazoo user ID or an email address

send_at.description: Defines when send customer defined notification. For `callflow_exec` value notifications is send during calllfow execution. For `channel_destroy` value notification is send after channel(bridge) is destroed

template_id.description: Template ID of account defined notification
